verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H2063>This<s%> shall be the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H6879>leper<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2893>cleansing:<s%> He shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> be <S%H7495>healed<s%> in the <S%H6879>leper;<s%>

Then shall the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> for him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> and <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and <S%H231>hyssop:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> that <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H6833>birds<s%> be <S%H7819>killed<s%> in an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water:<s%>

As for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H6833>bird,<s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> it, and the <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and the <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and the <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> them and the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6833>bird<s%> that was <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water:<s%>

And he shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> on him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> from the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and shall let the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H7971>loose<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field.<s%>

And he that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H1548>shave<s%> off <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H8181>hair,<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> that he may be <S%H2891>clean:<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that he shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and shall <S%H3427>tarry<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> out of his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

But it shall be on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H8181>hair<s%> off his <S%H7218>head<s%> and his <S%H2206>beard<s%> and his <S%H1354>eyebrows,<s%> <S%H5869><s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H8181>hair<s%> he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> off: and he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> also he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and he shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> he <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3535>ewe<s%> <S%H3535>lamb<s%> of the <S%H1323>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meat offering, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that makes him <S%H2891>clean<s%> shall <S%H5975>present<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that is to be <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and those things, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> he <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> and <S%H7126>offer<s%> him for a <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering, and the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

And he shall <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering and the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%> for as the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering is the <S%H3548>priest's,<s%> so is the <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering: it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H3709>palm<s%> of his <S%H3548>own<s%> <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H8042>hand:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

And of the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H3709>hand<s%> shall the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot,<s%> on the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering:

And the <S%H3498>remnant<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%> he shall <S%H5414>pour<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> from his <S%H2932>uncleanness;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering:

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the meat offering on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him, and he shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he be <S%H1800>poor,<s%> and <S%H369>cannot<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H5381>get<s%> so much; then he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> for a <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering to be <S%H8573>waved,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deal of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and a <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil;<s%>

And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> such as he is <S%H5381>able<s%> to <S%H5381>get;<s%> and the <S%H259>one<s%> shall be a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and the <S%H259>other<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> them on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> for his <S%H2893>cleansing<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering, and the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

And he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot:<s%>
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H3709>palm<s%> of his <S%H3548>own<s%> <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H8042>hand:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> with his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H676>finger<s%> some of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H3709>hand<s%> on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot,<s%> on the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering:

And the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%> he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And he shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> of the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> such as he can <S%H5381>get;<s%>

Even such as he is <S%H5381>able<s%> to <S%H5381>get,<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H4503>offering,<s%> with the meat offering: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of him in <S%H834>whom<s%> is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> is not <S%H5381>able<s%> to <S%H5381>get<s%> that which pertains to his <S%H2893>cleansing.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you be <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> to you for a <S%H272>possession,<s%> and I <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession;<s%>

And he that ownes the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> It <S%H7200>seems<s%> to me there is as it were a <S%H5061>plague<s%> in the <S%H1004>house:<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> that they <S%H6437>empty<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> into it to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5061>plague,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> be not made <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H1004>house:<s%>

And he shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be in the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H8258>hollow<s%> <S%H8258>strakes,<s%> <S%H3422>greenish<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H125>reddish,<s%> which in <S%H4758>sight<s%> are <S%H8217>lower<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H7023>wall;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> up the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and shall <S%H7200>look:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> that they <S%H2502>take<s%> away the <S%H68>stones<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is, and they shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H5892>city:<s%>

And he shall cause the <S%H1004>house<s%> to be <S%H7106>scraped<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and they shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out the <S%H6083>dust<s%> that they <S%H7096>scrape<s%> off <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%>

And they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H935>put<s%> them in the <S%H8478>place<s%> of those <S%H68>stones;<s%> and he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H6083>mortar,<s%> and shall <S%H2902>plaster<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H6524>break<s%> out in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that he has <S%H2502>taken<s%> away the <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> he has <S%H7096>scraped<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> it is <S%H2902>plastered;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7200>look,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> it is a <S%H3992>fretting<s%> <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in the <S%H1004>house;<s%> it is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5422>break<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> of it, and the <S%H6086>timber<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6083>mortar<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and he shall <S%H3318>carry<s%> them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

Moreover he that <S%H935>goes<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the while that it is <S%H5462>shut<s%> up shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And he that <S%H7901>lies<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes;<s%> and he that <S%H398>eats<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> in, and <S%H7200>look<s%> on it, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> has not <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H2902>plastered:<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2891>clean,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> to <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6833>birds,<s%> and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and <S%H231>hyssop:<s%>
And he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H6833>birds<s%> in an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water:<s%>
